name: iBooks Author Document Template
summary: Learn about .BOOKTEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Document templates more often use the .IBATEMPLATE extension. The iBooks Author installation includes several templates that use the ".ibatemplate" extension, not the ".booktemplate" extension.

description: Book design template created by iBooks Author, a digital book authoring application; includes design presets for the page layout, text settings, and other book properties; used as the starting point for a book project (.BOOK file).

images.alt: Screenshot of a .booktemplate file in Blurb BookSmart 3.4
images.caption: BOOKTEMPLATE file open in Blurb BookSmart 3.4
